price: 14.Ama marak raaqe num mayan inkih farmoytit dirabboyseenih akke waytek. Eddeluk Yallih digaalá cakkisiteeniih keenil obteh.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
